title: har pages
body:
I'm happy that Microsoft Edge's F12 Developer Tools now export network requests as a HAR file in the JSON format.
However, it leaves out any reference to pages. The JSON pages array is completely gone, and each request in the entries array is missing the pageref parameter. Not sure why this is missing since it is part of the HAR spec. It is even included in IE 11's network recordings that use an XML format, as well as every other browser that supports exporting HAR recordings using JSON format.
I would appreciate it if this could get fixed so the Edge HAR files follow the HAR spec.

comments.body: I'm not sure if this issue has gotten any attention. I would like to reiterate the problem in more detail.

Agree, this is an important part of the spec and it should definitely be fixed.
http://www.softwareishard.com/blog/har-12-spec/

While SPA do not clearly delineate between pages, there are still many sites where pages are a central component. This delimiter is critical for breaking down large groups of requests into manageable chunks.
Fully agreed. Can't believe something like this got left out.
